description: Returns detailed metadata about the specified ACM certificate. If you have just created a certificate using the RequestCertificate action, there is a delay of several seconds before you can retrieve information about it.

parameters.name: CertificateArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ACM certificate. The ARN must have the following form: arn:aws:acm:region:123456789012:certificate/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs).

nested_items.name: Certificate
nested_items.description: Metadata about an ACM certificate.

nested_items.name: CertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domain name for the certificate, such as www.example.com or example.com.

nested_items.name: SubjectAlternativeNames
nested_items.description: One or more domain names (subject alternative names) included in the certificate. This list contains the domain names that are bound to the public key that is contained in the certificate. The subject alternative names include the canonical domain name (CN) of the certificate and additional domain names that can be used to connect to the website.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DomainValidationOptions
nested_items.description: Contains information about the initial validation of each domain name that occurs as a result of the  RequestCertificate request. This field exists only when the certificate type is AMAZON_ISSUED.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: A fully qualified domain name (FQDN) in the certificate. For example, www.example.com or example.com.

nested_items.name: ValidationEmails
nested_items.description: A list of email addresses that ACM used to send domain validation emails.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ValidationDomain
nested_items.description: The domain name that ACM used to send domain validation emails.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The validation status of the domain name. This can be one of the following values:
PENDING_VALIDATION.
SUCCESS.
FAILED.

nested_items.name: ResourceRecord
nested_items.description: Contains the CNAME record that you add to your DNS database for domain validation. For more information, see Use DNS to Validate Domain Ownership.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the DNS record to create in your domain. This is supplied by ACM.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of DNS record. Currently this can be CNAME.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the CNAME record to add to your DNS database. This is supplied by ACM.

nested_items.name: ValidationMethod
nested_items.description: Specifies the domain validation method.

nested_items.name: Serial
nested_items.description: The serial number of the certificate.

nested_items.name: Subject
nested_items.description: The name of the entity that is associated with the public key contained in the certificate.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate authority that issued and signed the certificate.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the certificate was requested.

nested_items.name: IssuedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the certificate was issued. This value exists only when the certificate type is AMAZON_ISSUED.

nested_items.name: ImportedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the certificate was imported. This value exists only when the certificate type is IMPORTED.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the certificate.

nested_items.name: RevokedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the certificate was revoked. This value exists only when the certificate status is REVOKED.

nested_items.name: RevocationReason
nested_items.description: The reason the certificate was revoked. This value exists only when the certificate status is REVOKED.

nested_items.name: NotBefore
nested_items.description: The time before which the certificate is not valid.

nested_items.name: NotAfter
nested_items.description: The time after which the certificate is not valid.

nested_items.name: KeyAlgorithm
nested_items.description: The algorithm that was used to generate the public-private key pair.

nested_items.name: SignatureAlgorithm
nested_items.description: The algorithm that was used to sign the certificate.

nested_items.name: InUseBy
nested_items.description: A list of ARNs for the Amazon Web Services resources that are using the certificate. A certificate can be used by multiple Amazon Web Services resources.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason the certificate request failed. This value exists only when the certificate status is FAILED. For more information, see Certificate Request Failed in the Certificate Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The source of the certificate. For certificates provided by ACM, this value is AMAZON_ISSUED. For certificates that you imported with  ImportCertificate, this value is IMPORTED. ACM does not provide managed renewal for imported certificates. For more information about the differences between certificates that you import and those that ACM provides, see Importing Certificates in the Certificate Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: RenewalSummary
nested_items.description: Contains information about the status of ACM's managed renewal for the certificate. This field exists only when the certificate type is AMAZON_ISSUED.

nested_items.name: RenewalStatus
nested_items.description: The status of ACM's managed renewal of the certificate.

nested_items.name: DomainValidationOptions
nested_items.description: Contains information about the validation of each domain name in the certificate, as it pertains to ACM's managed renewal. This is different from the initial validation that occurs as a result of the  RequestCertificate request. This field exists only when the certificate type is AMAZON_ISSUED.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: A fully qualified domain name (FQDN) in the certificate. For example, www.example.com or example.com.

nested_items.name: ValidationEmails
nested_items.description: A list of email addresses that ACM used to send domain validation emails.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ValidationDomain
nested_items.description: The domain name that ACM used to send domain validation emails.

nested_items.name: ValidationStatus
nested_items.description: The validation status of the domain name. This can be one of the following values:
PENDING_VALIDATION.
SUCCESS.
FAILED.

nested_items.name: ResourceRecord
nested_items.description: Contains the CNAME record that you add to your DNS database for domain validation. For more information, see Use DNS to Validate Domain Ownership.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the DNS record to create in your domain. This is supplied by ACM.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of DNS record. Currently this can be CNAME.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the CNAME record to add to your DNS database. This is supplied by ACM.

nested_items.name: ValidationMethod
nested_items.description: Specifies the domain validation method.

nested_items.name: RenewalStatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason that a renewal request was unsuccessful.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the renewal summary was last updated.

nested_items.name: KeyUsages
nested_items.description: A list of Key Usage X.509 v3 extension objects. Each object is a string value that identifies the purpose of the public key contained in the certificate. Possible extension values include DIGITAL_SIGNATURE, KEY_ENCHIPHERMENT, NON_REPUDIATION, and more.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A string value that contains a Key Usage extension name.

nested_items.name: ExtendedKeyUsages
nested_items.description: Contains a list of Extended Key Usage X.509 v3 extension objects. Each object specifies a purpose for which the certificate public key can be used and consists of a name and an object identifier (OID).

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of an Extended Key Usage value.

nested_items.name: OID
nested_items.description: An object identifier (OID) for the extension value. OIDs are strings of numbers separated by periods. The following OIDs are defined in RFC 3280 and RFC 5280.
1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.1 (TLS_WEB_SERVER_AUTHENTICATION)
1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.2 (TLS_WEB_CLIENT_AUTHENTICATION)
1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4 (EMAIL_PROTECTION)
1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.5 (IPSEC_END_SYSTEM)

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the private certificate authority (CA) that issued the certificate. This has the following format:

nested_items.name: RenewalEligibility
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the certificate is eligible for renewal. At this time, only exported private certificates can be renewed with the  RenewCertificate command.

nested_items.name: CertificateTransparencyLoggingPreference
nested_items.description: You can opt out of certificate transparency logging by specifying the DISABLED option. Opt in by specifying ENABLED.
